Text: Who is Allah? Well... that's fairly simple. Allah is the guy that Mohammed (may his ass be perpetually fucked by satan) thought was god, after smoking rocks and fucking male sheep in the ass. Thus, Allah is the original inventor of butt-fucking sheep.
Good question, and does he know what you do to little 9 year old girls (e.g. Aisha) in his name ???
May ALL organized religions fall and fail. Money is not the problem, religion is.
